vision: Integrated platform to manage the full IP lifecycle from invention disclosure to patent strategy, with AI-assisted tools for inventors, internal counsel, and executives.

modules.name: Branding & Design System
modules.description: Create a cohesive brand identity and reusable design system for the ExcavAIte web application.

features.name: Brand Identity
features.description: Define core brand elements to be used across the product.
subfeatures: Logo exploration (3 options, finalize 1)
Color palette definition
Typography scale and font pairing
Iconography style and library

features.name: Brand Book
features.description: Document brand guidelines for consistent usage.
subfeatures: Logo usage guidelines
Color and typography guidelines
Icon usage and style rules
Basic UI components examples
Brand tone and usage examples (up to 10 pages)

features.name: Design System Foundations
features.description: Create reusable UI tokens and base components for the web app.
subfeatures: Spacing, grid and layout system
Button variants (primary, secondary, destructive, ghost)
Form elements (inputs, dropdowns, textareas, toggles)
Status indicators, tags, badges and chips
Global theming support (light/dark ready, if in scope later)

modules.name: Core Platform & User Management
modules.description: Core web application shell, authentication, authorization, and role-based access control for all user types.

features.name: Authentication
features.description: Secure login and onboarding for different user types.
subfeatures: Email-based account creation
Secure login (password or SSO, TBD in discovery)
Password reset / recovery flow
Session management (JWT or similar token-based auth)
Account deactivation/reactivation (admin-controlled)

features.name: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
features.description: Restrict features based on user role (Inventor, IP Manager, Executive).
subfeatures: Role definitions and permissions matrix
Role assignment to users
Route-level and component-level access control
Audit log hooks for privileged actions (e.g., IP decisions)

features.name: Organization & Team Management
features.description: Group users under organizations and teams for shared IP context.
subfeatures: Organization profile (name, address, industry)
Invite users to organization via email
Assign roles within an organization
View members and roles
Basic usage/seat overview per organization

features.name: Global Navigation & Shell
features.description: Top-level layout, navigation, and switching between main product areas.
subfeatures: Primary navigation for Copilot, IP Manager, Mission Control
Secondary navigation (settings, help, profile)
Responsive layout for desktop and large tablets
Global search entry point (IP assets, documents, cases)
Notification center entry point (future extensibility)

modules.name: Copilot for Inventors
modules.description: AI-assisted workspace to help inventors document, refine, and submit invention disclosures.

features.name: Invention Disclosure Workspace
features.description: Guided interface for creating structured invention disclosures.
subfeatures: Create new invention disclosure
Guided sections (title, problem statement, solution, novelty, prior art, use cases, diagrams)
Autosave drafts and version history
Attach supporting files (documents, images, diagrams, code snippets)
Status indicator (draft, submitted, under review, accepted, rejected)

features.name: AI-Guided Authoring
features.description: Copilot assistance to improve clarity, completeness, and patentability of disclosures.
subfeatures: Contextual prompts per section (what to write, examples, hints)
Quality checks (completeness, clarity, novelty hints)
Suggestions for improving claim language (non-legal placeholder suggestions)
Highlighting of missing or weak sections
Explainability hints: why certain details are important for patentability

features.name: Prior Art & Similarity Check (Search Assist)
features.description: Assist inventors by surfacing potentially similar patents or disclosures.
subfeatures: Submit disclosure text to similarity search engine
Show list of potentially related patents/publications
Basic filters (jurisdiction, assignee, date)
Similarity score indicators
Save/attach selected references to disclosure for legal review

features.name: Submission & Collaboration with IP Manager
features.description: Workflow for submitting the disclosure to internal counsel.
subfeatures: Submit disclosure to IP Manager queue
Inventor notes to legal team (context, urgency, business use)
Comment thread for inventor–legal discussions
Change requests from IP Manager with tracked revisions
View current status and next steps for a disclosure

modules.name: IP Manager for Internal Counsel
modules.description: Primary workspace for legal teams to triage, review, rank, and manage invention disclosures and patent-related workflows.

features.name: Disclosure Intake & Triage
features.description: Queue and tools to manage incoming invention disclosures from inventors.
subfeatures: Inbox of new disclosures with key metadata (inventor, date, department, tags)
Disclosure detail view (full content, attachments, prior art references)
Assign reviewer / owner from legal team
Set priority and status (new, under review, needs info, approved for filing, archived)
Tagging and categorization (technology area, business unit, product line)

features.name: Disclosure Evaluation & Ranking
features.description: Support decision-making on which disclosures to pursue.
subfeatures: Customizable evaluation criteria (novelty, commercial value, risk, strategic fit)
Scoring interface per criterion
Overall score and rank among disclosures
AI-assist suggestions on risk/novelty based on similarity search
Shortlist views (top candidates for filing, revisit later, low-priority)

features.name: Patent Filing Workflow Support
features.description: High-level workflow tracking for disclosures moving towards patent applications.
subfeatures: Flag disclosure as proceeding to patent filing
Capture filing decisions (jurisdictions, patent type, timeline notes)
Link to external patent counsel (if applicable, note-level integration)
Track statuses (pre-filing, drafted, filed, office-action, granted, abandoned)
Attach external documents (draft applications, office actions, responses)

features.name: Assertion Letter Response Support
features.description: Specialized tools to support response workflows for assertion letters and infringement claims.
subfeatures: Case intake: log assertion letter details (sender, date, patent(s), product(s) referenced)
Determine entity type (NPE vs competitor) using data lookup/API and internal rules
Check if company has previously filed suits on the patent (litigation history integration or data lookup)
Compare patent claims vs allegedly infringing product (text/semantic comparison assist)
Generate AI-assisted outlines for response or internal memo (not final legal advice)
Case status tracking (new, under analysis, responded, closed)

features.name: Unpublished IP Detection
features.description: System to identify if documents contain potentially unpublished intellectual property.
subfeatures: Upload or ingest documents (docs, PDFs, text, etc.)
Run unpublished IP detection analysis
Tunable sensitivity configuration (low/medium/high or numeric thresholds)
Highlight segments that may contain novel/unpublished IP
Flag documents that require legal review before external publication

modules.name: Mission Control for Executives
modules.description: High-level strategic dashboard for Heads of IP and C-suite to monitor IP portfolio health and risk.

features.name: Portfolio Overview Dashboard
features.description: Top-level view of the company’s IP assets and pipeline.
subfeatures: KPIs: number of disclosures, filings, grants, active cases
Pipeline breakdown by stage (disclosure, review, filing, granted)
Technology-area heatmap (where innovation is concentrated)
View by business unit / geography

features.name: Strategic Risk & Opportunity Insights
features.description: Highlight risks, gaps, and opportunities in the IP portfolio.
subfeatures: Highlight under-protected strategic product areas
Flag areas with heavy external assertion activity
Identify high-potential disclosures awaiting decisions
Trend analysis (filings over time, grants, abandonments)

features.name: Executive Reporting & Export
features.description: Generate summaries and reports for leadership and board-level communication.
subfeatures: Downloadable reports (PDF or CSV) of key metrics
Configurable reporting timeframes (quarterly, yearly, custom)
Executive summary generator (AI-assisted narrative over charts)
Saved report templates for recurring use

modules.name: AI & Data Services Layer
modules.description: Shared AI/ML and data capabilities used by Copilot, IP Manager, and Mission Control.

features.name: Document & Image Embeddings
features.description: Core embedding services to power semantic search and detection.
subfeatures: Text embedding pipeline for disclosures, patents, documents
Image embedding pipeline for diagrams and figures
Vector index creation and maintenance
APIs for similarity search (top-K nearest neighbors)
Monitoring and logging of search relevance for refinement

features.name: Vector-Indexed Search
features.description: Semantic search over internal and external datasets.
subfeatures: Search across internal disclosures and IP assets
Search across external patent/publication datasets (where integrated)
Filter + facet search (by assignee, jurisdiction, date, tech area)
Ranking and scoring configuration
Search analytics (most searched queries, zero-result queries)

features.name: AI Inference Services
features.description: Reusable AI service interfaces for all modules.
subfeatures: Service for Copilot drafting and refinement
Service for unpublished IP detection scoring
Service for assertion letter analysis (claim vs product comparison)
Rate limiting, retries, and error handling for AI calls
Traceability for AI outputs (logs, prompts, responses) for auditability

features.name: External Data & API Integrations
features.description: Services to integrate with external datasets and APIs.
subfeatures: Integration with cloud document storage (S3 or similar)
Integration with patent/litigation data sources (exact providers TBD)
Configuration for API keys, secrets, and endpoints
Health checks and alerting for external integrations
Data ingestion jobs (scheduled/triggered) with monitoring

modules.name: Web Application UX & Frontend Delivery
modules.description: Front-end implementation of the product’s flows, using the branding and design system.

features.name: Responsive Web UI
features.description: User-friendly interface built on Next.js.
subfeatures: Responsive layouts for desktop and tablet usage
Accessible components (ARIA, keyboard navigation, contrast)
Loading, empty, and error states for major views
Global notifications/toasts for key actions
Consistent theming and design system usage

features.name: Global Search & Quick Actions (Phase-able)
features.description: Entry point for cross-module navigation and lookup.
subfeatures: Search bar to look up disclosures, cases, patents, and entities
Quick actions (create disclosure, open latest case, view dashboard)
Keyboard shortcuts for power users (configurable later)

features.name: Help & Onboarding
features.description: Support features for new users to get started.
subfeatures: Onboarding tour for each primary role (Inventor, IP Manager, Executive)
Contextual tooltips and help icons
Link to documentation or knowledge base
Feedback channel entry point (could integrate later with a ticketing system)

modules.name: Infrastructure, Security & Ops
modules.description: Backend infrastructure, deployment, observability, and security foundations on AWS.

features.name: Cloud Infrastructure Setup
features.description: Base infra for a secure and scalable deployment on AWS.
subfeatures: Environment setup (dev, staging, prod)
Compute setup (e.g., ECS/Lambda/EC2, TBD)
Managed database (RDS/DocumentDB or similar)
Object storage for documents and assets (S3)
VPC, networking, and security groups configuration

features.name: Security & Compliance Baseline
features.description: Core security measures for protecting IP and user data.
subfeatures: Authentication and authorization enforcement
Data encryption at rest and in transit
Secrets management (AWS Secrets Manager or SSM Parameter Store)
Role-based access policies in AWS (IAM)
Basic logging for security and access events

features.name: Monitoring, Logging & Alerting
features.description: Operational observability for reliability and performance.
subfeatures: Application logging (structured logs)
Metrics and dashboards (latency, error rates, usage)
Alerting on critical failures (API, ingestion, AI services)
Job monitoring for data pipelines and AI batch tasks
Basic cost monitoring and tagging for AWS resources

features.name: CI/CD Pipeline
features.description: Automated build, test, and deployment pipeline.
subfeatures: Automated builds for frontend and backend
Automated tests (unit and basic integration)
Staging deployments with smoke tests
Production deployment approvals and rollback strategy

notes: IP Manager is the primary feature for initial implementation.
Branding and design system should be completed early to guide UI work.
Workflows, evaluation criteria, and integration details will be refined during discovery workshops.
Long-term vision includes greater automation, but current focus is on augmenting human expertise at each stage of IP management.
